org.apache.drill.exec.rpc.user.security.testing

Class UserAuthenticatorTestImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.drill.exec.rpc.user.security.testing.UserAuthenticatorTestImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, UserAuthenticator

    public class UserAuthenticatorTestImpl
extends Object
implements UserAuthenticator
    Implement UserAuthenticator for testing: + UserAuthenticator and authentication of users from Java client to Drillbit. + user delegation.
